highligthedProjects.title: E-Commerce Website
highligthedProjects.summary: A feature-rich and responsive e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies.Users can explore product categories, view item details, manage their cart, and complete a purchase flow.The project emphasizes clean component structure, responsive design, and smooth user experience.

highligthedProjects.title: Pizza Store
highligthedProjects.summary: This is a sample e-commerce application where users can browse pizza products, view detailed information, add items to the cart, and place an order. The project is designed mobile-first and fully responsive.
